sentence.Network_en: He suffered two broken ribs in a fierce hand-to-hand battle.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在激烈的肉搏战中被打断了两根肋骨。

sentence.Network_en: Yesterday saw hand-to-hand combat in the city.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天该市发生了肉搏战。

sentence.Network_en: There was, reportedly, hand-to-hand combat in the streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 据说街上发生了肉搏战。

entry.def: Hand-to-hand fighting is fighting where the people are very close together, using either their hands or weapons such as knives.

example.ex: There was, reportedly, hand-to-hand combat in the streets...
example.tran: 据说街上发生了肉搏战。

example.ex: He suffered two broken ribs in a fierce hand-to-hand battle.
example.tran: 他在激烈的肉搏战中被打断了两根肋骨。
